item.title: Call for presenters for the MiR Fall Webinar Series!
item.description: Photo by Yan Krukov from Pexels Be a presenter for the MiR 2022 Fall Webinar Series! Are you interested in sharing your knowledge and your work to the MiR Community and beyond? We are looking for three speakers to kick off our MiR Fall 2022 Webinar Series! Topics include, but are not limited to: professional development(i.e. writing a resume, interview tips), sharing how to do a specific task using R (i.
